events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position in our backend team and will review it shortly.
Your application was successfully categorised under the Engineering department, specifically matching software development roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the interview process and answer any questions.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, demonstrating strong software development skills and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirming your availability for the next technical interview stage.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer role on May 8th at 2 PM via video call.
You successfully completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving and coding abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you to discuss company culture and benefits on May 11th at 10 AM.
The HR interview was conducted smoothly, and you expressed strong alignment with our company values.
We have proposed a job offer for the Software Engineer position including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You provided positive feedback on the job offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have accepted the offer and are excited to start your new role with our software development team.
Your onboarding process began with orientation sessions and setup for your development environment scheduled.
The hire is now closed successfully, welcoming you as a new member of the engineering team.
